effect.sword_shield: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.legends_arceus: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

short_effect.sword_shield: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.legends_arceus: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
